description.en: Build Unity games with optimized C# scripts, efficient rendering, and proper asset management. Masters Unity 6 LTS, URP/HDRP pipelines, and cross-platform deployment. Handles gameplay systems, UI implementation, and platform optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for Unity performance issues, game mechanics, or cross-platform builds.

Handles gameplay systems, UI implementation, and platform optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for Unity performance issues, game mechanics, or cross-platform builds.
